name: 创造与挑战
description:
This is a simple platform jumping game, but its level will be created by the players.

The game part --
There are 38 official checkpoints, divided into three chapters (each chapter includes six general checkpoints, three pit-to-pit checkpoints, three challenge checkpoints), and two special checkpoints.
In addition to the official checkpoint, there are currently more than 60 levels created by players (October 1, 2018 Statistics).

Level editor --
You can make all kinds of checkpoints.
After the production is completed, it can be uploaded directly to the server to share with other players.

- support for local multiplayer games. You can play with your friends.
